Lord, when thy hand is lifted up, they will not see. Transgressors do not perceive God's power in the judgments that are sent to the earth in every generation; they "confess not his hand in all things" (D&C 59:21).

but they shall see, and be ashamed for their envy at the people. The Jerusalem Bible has a much different reading: "Let them see your jealous love for this people and be ashamed, let the fire prepared for your enemies consume them." The shame that the wicked will experience pertains to the loss of the glory or honor that they would have received as God's worthy children. The fire mentioned here is an actual fire that will consume the wicked.
